info.title: LoggingPreferences API
info.description: The `LoggingPreferences` plugin allows you to control key press logging on a set-top box.

keystrokeMaskEnabled_b.summary: Whether keystroke mask is enabled (`true`) or disabled (`false`). If `true`, then any system that logs keystrokes must mask the actual keystroke being used. Default value is `false`.

isKeystrokeMaskEnabled.summary:
Gets logging keystroke mask status (enabled or disabled). 
 
### Events 

 No Events.

setKeystrokeMaskEnabled.summary:
Sets the keystroke logging mask property. If a keystroke mask is successfully changed, then this method triggers an `onKeystrokeMaskEnabledChange` event.
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `onKeystrokeMaskEnabledChange`| Triggered if the keystroke mask is changed successfully |

onKeystrokeMaskEnabledChange.summary: Triggered when the keystroke mask is changed.
